cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the design of pilot sequences for channel estimation in the context of multiple-user Massive MIMO, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the use of spatial correlation in channel estimation, which is a topic related to signal processing (cs.SI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper specifically focuses on the optimization of pilot length, which is a topic related to multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) systems (cs.MM).
